name: Ozone Ashes
description:
A kinetic visual novel originally made for Game Jam Plus Manila.

Story

March 18, 1996.
A fire broke out in an otherwise lively disco bar somewhere in Quezon City, and it would eventually be the worst one in Philippine history.
Beyond this tragedy lies another tragedy...
...of a high school couple who graduated in an unconventional -- and heartbreaking -- way.

Credits

Conceptualization, Story, UI Design, Programming, and Debugging
Benedict "Moonlight Bomber" Villariaza

Character Sprites
